articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Mt. Myohyang Children's Camp
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Myohyangsan Children's Camp 
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), together with Ri Sol Ju visited Pyongyang Myohyangsan Children's Camp situated at the foot of Mt. Myohyang in North Phyongan Province on Sunday. 
					 Before the monument to the instruction of President Kim Il Sung that one's camping in secondary school days would be unforgettable in one's whole life, Kim Jong Un said it is very meaningful one. He looked back with deep emotion on the President's history of loving care for posterity with which he made sure that children's camps were built in scenic spots of the country. 
					
					 He said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il proposed on number of occasions the task for successfully rebuilding the children's camp and personally examined its design in the last period of his life. 
					
					 He underscored the need to newly build the camp to be proud of in the world as early as possible and thus carry out without fail the behest of Kim Jong Il who made so much effort to provide a better camp to children.
					
					 He looked round various places including bedrooms, the  room for disseminating knowledge about camping, room for the Children's Union, room for cultural information service, room for the preservation of gifts, music room, dinning room and hall to learn in detail about children's camping.
					
					 He said that to build the camp as required by the era of Songun is an important work for realizing the lifelong desire of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who did everything for the children as their tender-hearted father all their lives. He called for newly building the camp instead of remodeling it. 
					
					 There are songs "We Are the Happiest in the World" and "General to Front while Children to Camps" loved by the children, he noted, adding:
					
					 I remember the loving care shown by the Generalissimos for posterity whenever I listen to those songs. There is a mountain of work to be done for building a thriving nation, but we must not spare investment in the building of camps. It is the determination of the party to excellently remodel not only this camp but all other camps, children's palaces and children's houses across the country.
					
					 When remodeling camps across the country, it is necessary to spruce up camps at the foot of mountains to match their landscape and those camps on seaside to do its landscape, and to this end it is important to work out designs well, he said, adding that he would send a standard design.
					
					 He noted that the main objective of the revolution being made despite manifold difficulties and trials is to bring happiness to the children and it is necessary to enable them to lead a happy life with no more desire in the world. 
					
					 That day he met with the children of different schools enjoying camping there and had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Choe Hwi, first vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and Pak Thae Song, vice department director of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: DPRK Table-Tennis Players Crowned in World Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Table-Tennis Players Crowned in World Championships
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK table-tennis players Kim Hyok Bong and Kim Jong won gold medals at the 52nd ITTF World Championships (individual events).
					 They trounced their Greek and Russian rivals each 4:0 at the first and second stage of the mixed doubles preliminaries.
					
					 At the third and fourth stage they beat their French and Japanese rivals each 4:2 before thrashing their south Korean rival 4:1 in quarterfinals.
					
					 They surpassed their rival from Hong Kong, China 4:3 in the semifinals and beat their south Korean rival 4:2 in the finals.

articles.title: National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools Open
articles.content:
National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools Open
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The 50th National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools was open with due ceremony in Hamhung, South Hamgyong Province on Sunday.
					 The participants will compete in more than 30 events including, football, basketball, volleyball, table tennis, weightlifting, judo, archery and gymnastics. The games will be held in Pyongyang, Hamhung, Phyongsong, Sariwon, Nampho and other places.
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony there was a football match between junvenile classes of South Hamgyong and Jagang provinces.

articles.title: U.S. and Puppet S. Korea Accused of Unethical Crime against Kwangju Protesters
articles.content:
U.S. and Puppet S. Korea Accused of Unethical Crime against Kwangju Protesters
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The Kwangju bloodbath committed by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean military fascist clique was a thrice-cursed unethical crime that can never be pardoned, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The genocide was a height of human rights violation as the people's desire for independence, democracy and reunification was ruthlessly quenched at the point of bayonets.
					
					 The homicidal maniacs went on the rampage, shooting machine-guns, showering shells and bullets from the air and ground and thus scorching Kwangju City and totally destroying and burning down streets, villages and people.
					
					 They massacred the protesters by burying them alive, shooting, beating and stabbing them irrespective of their age and sex. Pregnant women were of no exception. Such an indiscriminate genocide was, indeed, beyond human imagination. 
					
					 The U.S. was the very one who was behind the atrocity.
					
					 The nature of U.S. opt-repeated "democracy" and "human rights protection" has been brought to light through the atrocity. On May 22, the U.S. convened a meeting of the "National Security Council" at the White House where it allowed the south Korean fascist military to put down the uprising by force of arms.
					
					 At that time the U.S. confirmed that it would follow through on its "security commitment" with puppet south Korea and declared that it does not contradict with the U.S. "human rights policy". 
					
					 Brezinski, the then special assistant to the U.S. president for national security, blustered even the U.S. forces would be involved in quenching the violent mobs, while calling for quelling them with an iron fist.
					
					 Uttering surprising is that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have gone scot-free despite their unprecedented heinous human rights abuses.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group of south Korea should be thoroughly punished by the Korean nation and the world people for their unethical crime of having reduced south Korea into a theatre of human rights violation and a tundra of democracy by brandishing bayonets and by resorting to violence.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Joint Military Maneuvers by U.S. and Its Followers
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Joint Military Maneuvers by U.S. and Its Followers
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. plans to overwhelm the DPRK with numerical superiority of its nuclear strike means and put psychological pressure on it and thus make it give up satellite launch and nuclear development. An aim sought by the U.S. through joint military exercises is to realize with ease its strategy for invading the DPRK through disarmament.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. attached great strategic meanings to the war maneuvers this year.
					
					 Through a series of joint military maneuvers the U.S. has sought, first of all, to violate the sovereignty of the Korean people and their rights to existence and development. It also has sought to beef up its huge nuclear force on the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity pursuant to its strategy of prioritizing the Asia-Pacific region, and thus annex the DPRK.
					
					 By engaging in nuclear threats with the use of massive nuclear war hardware, the hostile forces have pushed forward an immediate task of turning the DPRK, a nuclear weapons state, into a non-nuclear state.
					
					 It is the common practices by the U.S. in the international arena to make a case with hostile act, pose a military threat based on it and turn the aggressive wild ambition into a reality.
					
					 The recent war maneuvers were a result of the U.S. hostile act against the DPRK that assumed military dimensions and has become more violent following the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes. The U.S., in fact, referred the issue of the DPRK's sovereignty and right to self-defence to the UN and now tries to turn the DPRK to the non-nuclear direction.
					
					 A country possessed of a powerful nuclear deterrence can disable any strategies of the imperialists for demonstrating military strength, timely frustrate any scheme of the hostile forces and achieve prosperity. This is the truth the Korean people have drawn from their experiences of the nuclear showdown with the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth Stage Demonstrations for Peace against War
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth Stage Demonstrations for Peace against War
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- South Korean young people are staging demonstrations for peace against war at the plaza of Kwanghwamun, Seoul.
					 Led by Kim Jun Han's call for turning out in the action for peace against war on April 9, students, company members and other youth are staging street demonstrations.
					
					 The danger of war has not been removed from this land due to the ceaseless maneuvers in which the U.S. nuclear aircraft carrier has been involved, they charged.
					
					 The U.S. is escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula, gaining benefits, and the people on this land are suffering damage, they deplored.
					
					 They stressed the need to fight it out to put an end to the state of war on the peninsula and achieve peace at an early date.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces, Conclusion of Peace Treaty Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces, Conclusion of Peace Treaty Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and other civic and public organizations of south Korea held the 5th Wednesday action for withdrawal of the U.S. forces and for peace against war beside the U.S.-south Korea "Combined Forces Command" on May 15.
					 Speakers accused the present chief executive of her trip to the U.S., adding the aspiration of the people for independent reunification is growing stronger though the "government" seeks the policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The conservative ruling forces cannot see such a reality as they serve the U.S. regarding it as heaven, they noted.
					
					 In order to definitely remove the danger of war from this land, it is necessary to have the U.S. forces withdrawn and a peace treaty concluded, they held.
					
					 They underscored the need to wage a dynamic struggle for peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Action for Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Civic, public, academic, religious and other organizations of south Korea on May 15 formed the Joint Council of All Circles for Peace, Reconciliation and Cooperation on Korean Peninsula.
					 An inaugural ceremony took place beside the Seoul City Office.
					
					 The organization said people of all circles are turning out in the struggle for peace against war because the Korean nation is suffering biggest damage due to the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It called upon all the people to find out a way for peace and realize it.
					
					 It declared it would conduct activities to achieve durable peace on the peninsula on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 60th anniversary of the Korean Armistice Agreement.

articles.title: Punishment of Chun Doo Hwan Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Chun Doo Hwan Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Members of more than 20 civic and public organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on May 16 calling for punishing traitor Chun Doo Hwan, matchless murderer who masterminded the Kwangju massacres. Those organizations included the Seoul Society for Commemorating the May 18 Popular Resistance and the Bar Association for Democratic Society.
					 At the press conference speakers said additional imposition was passed on to Chun, the erstwhile military dictator, for his irregularities and corruption during his tenure of office, but he has not yet paid it.
					
					 Chun is gaining the respect of others while squandering money on a luxury life, they held.
					
					 700 million won collected from the people as tax is being allotted for guarding him every year, they said, dismissing it as a mockery of the people.
					
					 To punish the murder who violated democracy of society and human rights and committed all corruptions is to set right history, they said.

articles.title: Int'l Anti-Imperialist Seminar Supports Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Int'l Anti-Imperialist Seminar Supports Korean People's Just Cause
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The international anti-imperialist seminar expressed full support and solidarity for the just cause of the Korean people. It was held in Turkey from April 14 to 19.
					 Present there were at least 150 delegates and officials of political parties and organizations from more than 20 countries.
					
					 A resolution on solidarity for the DPRK was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 The U.S. prodded the UN Security Council into adopting a "resolution" against the DPRK, terming its satellite launch in December last year an "inter-continental ballistic missile launch", the resolution said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK's satellite launch was an exercise of its legitimate right which no one can call into question.
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to conduct the third underground nuclear test to cope with the arbitrary practices of the U.S. and hostile forces which wantonly violated the independent right of a sovereign state.
					
					 The DPRK's third underground nuclear test was a just step to defend the supreme interests of the state from the hostile acts of the imperialist allied forces to encroach upon the sovereignty and dignity of the country. The U.S. and its followers, however, faked up again a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK to make the public convince that the DPRK has increased the nuclear threat.
					
					 The DPRK has been exposed to the U.S. nuclear threats.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula has become the most dangerous region where a nuclear war may break out any time due to the U.S. moves.
					
					 The international anti-imperialist seminar calls upon world progressive people, political parties, organizations and figures aspiring after independence to pay heed to the situation on the Korean Peninsula and extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people's struggle against imperialism.

articles.title: French Organization Calls for Signature Campaign for Peace on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
French Organization Calls for Signature Campaign for Peace on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association on May 12 issued an appeal calling for a signature campaign for denouncing the U.S. and south Korean authorities for contemplating kicking off the large-scale combined naval drills to escalate the situation again.
					 In the wake of staging the war maneuvers against the DPRK with huge forces involved in March and April, the U.S. and south Korean authorities introduced latest war hardware to the East Sea of Korea to kick off large-scale combined naval drills, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. ceaseless war maneuvers are aimed to stifle the DPRK by force of arms and dominate Northeast Asia.
					
					 It is misleading world public about the situation, giving impression that it is being deteriorated due to the "military threat" of the DPRK but the reality clearly proves that it is none other than the U.S. which pushed the situation in and around the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase.
					
					 Progressive mankind should pay due attention to the U.S. new war provocation moves on the peninsula and no longer be taken in by the U.S. false information about the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We call upon all the progressive and peace-loving forces in France to positively turn out in the nationwide signature campaign to denounce the U.S. and ensure lasting peace and security on the Korean Peninsula today when a grave situation is prevailing there.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent Upbuilding Supported Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent Upbuilding Supported Abroad
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The world community is becoming increasingly supportive of the DPRK's line on further bolstering up the nuclear deterrence to cope with the undisguised nuclear threat by U.S. imperialism.
					 The Commune Forum Information Agency of Finland in its internet magazine noted it is just for the DPRK to counter the U.S. nuclear war threat by its own nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. has staged joint military drills with south Korea while introducing more and more nuclear war means into the Korean Peninsula in a bid to push the regional situation to the brink of a nuclear war, it said.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil said the DPRK's strengthening of nuclear deterrence is essential and just as it is exposed to the ceaseless aggression threat by the U.S.
					
					 A Ukraine internet newspaper commented as follows:
					
					  What fate would the DPRK have met and how miserable situation would have prevailed on the Korean Peninsula had the DPRK not had access to nuclear deterrence?
					
					 It might have met the same lot as Iraq and Libya and the peninsula have turned into a theatre of war like the Balkans late in the last century and Afghanistan early in the present century.
					
					 Fortunately, there was a nuclear deterrence in the DPRK.
					
					 This is the reason why the DPRK's nuclear deterrence creditably ensures the peace on the peninsula.
					
					 Proretaren, organ of the Communist Party in Sweden, said the U.S. is desperately moving to inflict nuclear holocaust upon not only the Korean but other people in the world. The world is being saved thanks to the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK, it added.
					
					 The chairman of the Socialist Party of Benin said the U.S. is to blame for the unprecedented danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 He extended support to the just cause of the DPRK to defend the sovereignty of the country and build a thriving socialist nation by adhering to the new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 The secretary general of the Pakistan Labour Federation said the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK serves as a powerful means for defending its sovereignty and as an all-mighty treasured sword for foiling the nuclear war moves of the U.S. imperialists and bringing earlier the day of reunification on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige la Fabrica de Licor Ryongmun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige la Fabrica de Licor Ryongmun
Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la fabrica de licor Ryongmun.
					Luego de escuchar explicaciones ante el panorama de la fabrica, el Comandante Supremo recibio el parte detallado sobre el estado de construccion.
					
					Al construir a las alturas del nuevo siglo esta moderna fabrica que normaliza su produccion en alto nivel, cumplimos uno de los legados del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, dijo.
					
					Recorriendo los procesos de filtracion de agua y de produccion de licores y embalaje, el almacen, la sala de muestras y otros puntos, se cercioro del estado de produccion.
					
					Antes de pasar por el proceso de filtracion, dijo que la calidad de licor depende principalmente de la calidad de agua y pregunto cual agua manantial se usa en la fabrica.
					
					Tras escuchar la respuesta de los funcionarios de que usan el agua manantial que surte de la roca natural a cientos de metros desde el taller de produccion y cuyo caudal y propiedades fisicas y quimicas no varian en todas las estaciones del ano, averiguo las caracteristicas tecnicas de los procesos de filtracion de agua con varias sustancias como cloro y ferromanganesio, etc.
					
					Recorrio con profunda atencion el proceso de produccion y embalaje de licor.
					
					Al examinar el recipiente y la marca que usa la fabrica, resalto la importancia de disenar bien las marcas que garantizan la calidad de producto y se utilizan mucho en la propaganda.
					
					Al mirar a los productores empaquetando los productos, instruyo automatizar en alto nivel el proceso de embalaje para ahorrar la mano de obra y los costos de produccion.
					
					En la sala de control, el Mariscal destaco la necesidad de establecer el moderno sistema de mando general para organizar con esmero la administracion empresarial y las actividades de gestion.
					
					En el almacen lleno de productos, el Comandante Supremo inquirio la capacidad de almacenamiento y los tipos de medios de transporte y agrego que hace falta asegurar mas hermeticidad y tomar medidas para mantener la temperatura y humedad convenientes para que no se altere la calidad de los productos.
					
					En la sala de muestras, vio la tabla de analisis para la comparacion de calidad con los licores famosos y se cercioro del grado alcoholico, el volumen y la calidad de los licores hechos en la fabrica.
					
					Enseno en detalles las tareas y remedios que se presentan en la produccion y la operacion de la fabrica.
					
					Al final, se fotografio junto con los obreros de la fabrica.
						Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Jon Chang Bok, Pak Jong Chon y So Hong Chan.
